.. _example_notebooks:


Tutorials
==========

Below is a gallery of examples on how to use this package, and scripts showing how to add/contribute new multimodal methods to this package.


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnails">


.. raw:: html

    </div>


Customising Fusilli
=======================================================

These are examples showing how to get more in depth with Fusilli and customise its behaviour.

* Modify the fusion model structures
* Change the training behaviour: early stopping, batch size, test set size, etc.
* Use Fusilli for hyperparameter tuning by adding suffixes to training outputs


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnails">


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="This tutorial will show you how to customise the training of your fusion model.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /auto_examples/customising_behaviour/images/thumb/sphx_glr_customising_training_parameters_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_auto_examples_customising_behaviour_customising_training_parameters.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">How to customise the training in Fusilli</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="This tutorial will show you how to modify the architectures of fusion models.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /auto_examples/customising_behaviour/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_modify_layer_sizes_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_auto_examples_customising_behaviour_plot_modify_layer_sizes.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">How to modify fusion model architecture</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    </div>

==========================================
